mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OFFSCHECREWDETAILINFO ( SCHECREWUID, SCHEDULERINFOUID, ROLE1, ROLE2, TERMINAL, NOTEBOOK , MODEL_NAME, SERIAL_NUMBER, FOREIGNER, PASSPORT_NUMBER, ORDER_STATUS , ORDER_DATE, ORDER_UID, DELETE_YN, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_UID, QR_YN, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{scheCrewUid}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{role1}, #{role2}, #{terminal}, #{notebook} , #{modelName}, #{serialNumber}, #{foreigner}, #{passportNumber}, #{orderStatus} , #{orderDate}, #{orderUid}, #{deleteYn}, #{deleteDate}, #{deleteUid}, #{qrYn}, #{regDate})

INSERT INTO OFFMOBILE_ROOM_INFO ( PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, DECK, ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME , TEL, SIZE_M2, BED_COUNT, BATHROOM_YN, STATUS, DEL_YN , ANDROID_ID, MOBILE_DEVICE_ID, INSERT_DATE, REG_USERNAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USERNAME) VALUES (#{projNo}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{trialKey}, #{deck}, #{roomNo}, #{roomName} , #{tel}, #{sizeM2}, #{bedCount}, #{bathroomYn}, #{status}, #{delYn} , #{androidId}, #{mobileDeviceId}, #{insertDate}, #{regUsername}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUsername})

INSERT INTO OFFMOBILE_ROOM_USERLIST ( PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, ROOM_NO, DEPARTMENT, NAME , PHONE, USER_UID, CHECK_IN_DATE, CHECK_OUT_DATE, STATUS, DEL_YN , ANDROID_ID, MOBILE_DEVICE_ID, INSERT_DATE, REG_USERNAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USERNAME, REMARK) VALUES (#{projNo}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{trialKey}, #{roomNo}, #{department}, #{name} , #{phone}, #{userUid}, #{checkInDate}, #{checkOutDate}, #{status}, #{delYn} , #{androidId}, #{mobileDeviceId}, #{insertDate}, #{regUsername}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUsername}, #{remark})

INSERT INTO OFFMOBILE_LIFT_BOAT_INFO ( PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, LIFTBOAT_CNT, LIFTBOAT_HEADCNT , LIFTRAFT_CNT, LIFTRAFT_HEADCNT, ANDROID_ID, INSERT_DATE, INSERTBY, REG_DEVICE) VALUES (#{projNo}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{trialKey}, #{liftboatCnt}, #{liftboatHeadcnt} , #{liftraftCnt}, #{liftraftHeadcnt}, #{androidId}, #{insertDate}, #{insertby}, #{regDevice})

INSERT INTO OFFMOBILE_LIFT_BOAT_CREWINFO ( PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, BOAT_NAME, USER_UID , ROLE, ANDROID_ID, INSERT_DATE, INSERTBY, REG_DEVICE) VALUES (#{projNo}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{trialKey}, #{boatName}, #{userUid} , #{role}, #{androidId}, #{insertDate}, #{insertBy}, #{regDevice})

INSERT INTO OFFMOBILE_NOTIFICATION ( NOTICEID, PROJ_NO, TRIALKEY, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TYPECODE , NCONTENT, STATCODE, START_DT, FINISHDT, DELETEYN , AUTHORID, CREATEDT, EDITORID, UPDATEDT) VALUES (#{noticeid}, #{projNo}, #{trialKey}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{typecode} , #{ncontent}, #{statcode}, #{startDt}, #{finishdt}, #{deleteyn} , #{authorid}, #{createdt}, #{editorid}, #{updatedt})

INSERT INTO OFFMOBILE_OFFLINE_COMMAND_INFO ( PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, COMMAND_IP, COMMAND_PORT , ANDROID_ID, INSERT_DATE, INSERTBY, REG_DEVICE) VALUES (#{projNo}, #{schedulerInfoUid}, #{trialKey}, #{commandIp}, #{commandPort} , #{androidId}, #{insertDate}, #{insertby}, #{regDevice})
mapper.select: SELECT UID, SCHECREWUID, SCHEDULERINFOUID, ROLE1, ROLE2, TERMINAL, NOTEBOOK , MODEL_NAME, SERIAL_NUMBER, FOREIGNER, PASSPORT_NUMBER, ORDER_STATUS , ORDER_DATE, ORDER_UID, DELETE_YN, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_UID, QR_YN, REG_DATE FROM OFFSCHECREWDETAILINFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})

SELECT UID, PROJ_NO AS projNo, SCHEDULERINFOUID AS schedulerInfoUid, TRIALKEY AS trialKey, DECK AS deck, ROOM_NO AS roomNo, ROOM_NAME AS roomName , TEL AS tel, SIZE_M2 AS sizeM2, BED_COUNT AS bedCount, BATHROOM_YN AS bathroomYn, STATUS AS status, DEL_YN AS delYn , ANDROID_ID AS androidId, MOBILE_DEVICE_ID AS mobileDeviceId, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, REG_USERNAME AS regUsername, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, UPDATE_USERNAME AS updateUsername FROM OFFMOBILE_ROOM_INFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})

SELECT UID, PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, ROOM_NO, DEPARTMENT, NAME , PHONE, USER_UID, CHECK_IN_DATE, CHECK_OUT_DATE, STATUS, DEL_YN , ANDROID_ID, MOBILE_DEVICE_ID, INSERT_DATE, REG_USERNAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USERNAME, REMARK FROM OFFMOBILE_ROOM_USERLIST WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})

SELECT UID, PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, LIFTBOAT_CNT, LIFTBOAT_HEADCNT , LIFTRAFT_CNT, LIFTRAFT_HEADCNT, ANDROID_ID, INSERT_DATE, INSERTBY, REG_DEVICE FROM OFFMOBILE_LIFT_BOAT_INFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})
SELECT UID, PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, BOAT_NAME, USER_UID , ROLE, ANDROID_ID, INSERT_DATE, INSERTBY, REG_DEVICE FROM OFFMOBILE_LIFT_BOAT_CREWINFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})

SELECT ORIID, NOTICEID, PROJ_NO, TRIALKEY, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TYPECODE , NCONTENT, STATCODE, START_DT, FINISHDT, DELETEYN , AUTHORID, CREATEDT, EDITORID, UPDATEDT FROM OFFMOBILE_NOTIFICATION WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})
SELECT UID, PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, COMMAND_IP, COMMAND_PORT , ANDROID_ID, INSERT_DATE, INSERTBY, REG_DEVICE FROM OFFMOBILE_OFFLINE_COMMAND_INFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})

SELECT UID, PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, SCHEUSERUID, DEPT_NAME , MEAL_TIME, MEAL_GUBUN, MEAL_DATE, QR_YN , ANDROID_ID, MOBILE_DEVICE_ID, INSERTBY, INSERTDATE, UPDATEBY, UPDATEDATE FROM OFFMOBILE_MEAL_USERINFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})

SELECT UID, PROJ_NO, SCHEDULERINFOUID, TRIALKEY, ANCHOR_MEAL_UID, REG_USERNAME , PHONE, INSERT_DATE, REG_DEVICE, SMSYN, SMSR_RETURN, SMS_INSERT_DATE FROM OFFMOBILE_MEAL_SMS_USERINFO WHERE SCHEDULERINFOUID IN (${_parameter})
